SELECT B.BOOK_NO, B.BOOK_NAME, B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE, B.BOOK_DESCRIPTION, B.BOOK_LIST_PRICE, B.PUBLISHER_NO, B.BOOK_VIEW_COUNT, B.BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING, BA.AUTHOR_NO, BA.AUTHOR_TYPE, A.AUTHOR_NAME, BI.BOOK_IMAGE_COVER, P.PUBLISHER_NAME, B.CATEGORY_NO, C.CATEGORY_NAME, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(Y.AUTHOR_NAME SEPARATOR ', ') FROM BOOK_AUTHOR X, AUTHOR Y WHERE X.AUTHOR_NO = Y.AUTHOR_NO AND X.BOOK_NO = B.BOOK_NO) AUTHORS FROM BOOK B, BOOK_IMAGES BI, BOOK_AUTHOR BA, AUTHOR A, PUBLISHER P,CATEGORY C WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BA.BOOK_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = BI.BOOK_NO AND BA.AUTHOR_NO = A.AUTHOR_NO AND B.PUBLISHER_NO = P.PUBLISHER_NO AND B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND B.BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING >= 3.5
AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword}
AND C.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT C.CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword})
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 14 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 56 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 84 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 168 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(),INTERVAL 168 DAY)
GROUP BY B.BOOK_NO LIMIT #{offset}, #{recordSize};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK B, BOOK_IMAGES BI, BOOK_AUTHOR BA, AUTHOR A, PUBLISHER P, CATEGORY C WHERE B.BOOK_NO = BA.BOOK_NO AND B.BOOK_NO = BI.BOOK_NO AND BA.AUTHOR_NO = A.AUTHOR_NO AND B.PUBLISHER_NO = P.PUBLISHER_NO AND B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO AND B.BOOK_AVERAGE_RATING >= 3.5
AND C.CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword}
AND C.CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT C.CATEGORY_NO FROM CATEGORY WHERE C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO = #{cateKeyword})
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 14 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 56 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 84 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 168 DAY)
AND B.BOOK_PUBLISHED_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 168 DAY)
